root: ^Me：(I can get in the line here. The smell... I think I've gotten used to it.)

b: ^Me：(What's this? DIY contest, free entry, grand prize?)
^Me：(I should ask the owner about it when it's my turn.)

waiting: ^Me：(Few people are in the line, but you also can't say it's not popular at all.)
owner: ^Me：(Seaweed-like tangled hair, clumped out mascara...I like it.)
^Me：(Ahem. Nice head. You could sense the anime girl cliche, but the dirty finish really appeals to me. Cute.)
others: ^Me：(People in this line look pretty young. Young enough for a gimmick-filled, trendy food truck.)
^Me：(Students during summer vacation? Young travellers attracted by the affordable beach?)
^Me：(But I'm just a penniless painter, with important work to finish in this town...)
my_turn: ^？？？："Boroboro" Fish Shaved~Ice! Hello there, "Boro-chan" at your service❤!
^boro-chan：What kind of shaved ice would you like? Would you taste our limited special -- Torpedo Avocado Aficionado's Ice?
order_new: ^boro-chan: The Torpedo Avocado Afictionado's Ice is the modified version of our most-beloved Deep Sea Treasure Ice, with chunks of three different fishes dipped in boro-chan sauce, hidden inside the ice.
^boro-chan: Is there anything else you need?
order_classic: ^Me：(The couple at the bar were holding what looked like this Premium Platter ice...)
^boro-chan: Is there anything else you need?
diy: ^boro-chan：It's been on for a while, no one's serious about it, only some kids who wanted to play. Messed up the truck. Bad. Was gonna take it down today...
^Me：(It's been up for a long time? I don't remember it at all... Never mind, I've forgotten too much recently.)
^boro-chan：But if it's the painter...you might bring it back alive.
^boro-chan：I think, I thought, you look like... Oops, must've come up somewhere before... No, no, we've never met, and, and I'm not some creepy stalker or anything...
^Me：(She sounds nervous?) I'm sorry, I've forgotten a few things lately. Actually, I think I might've been here before.
^boro-chan：Ohhh, you came before? For ice? That makes sense. Ha, I've forgotten too. That's right.
^Me：(It's nothing, but when she said that, it started to seem suspicious.)
^boro-chan：DIY, DIY! Make your ice yourself! You're free to use this countertop here~
